11123311.title: Ms. Fine's dirty little secret....

111233111.content:
It was just the 2 of them... and a huge plate of assorted donuts, cookies and breakfast pastries on his desk.
"Hi Ms. Fine! Wow.. are these for me?" Tommy asked when he saw his desk.
"Yes it is.. but you gotta keep it quiet and eat it quick before the rest of the class comes in so they don't all get jealous." She smiled and winked.

So Tommy dug in as fast as he could. The last thing the greedy boy wanted to do was share such a delicious and somewhat unexpected treat. A glazed donut went down first, followed by cheese streudal, boston cream donut was next. As he was chewing, he felt his mouth get dry... and Ms. Fine jumped up right away. "Oh, I almost forgot your milk!" she handed him a big cup filled to the top of creamy whole milk. He quickly started chugging the cold, creamy, satisfying drink. Then stopped as chocolate frosted glazed donut caught his eye. He licked his lips and brushed the milk off and dug in.

Donut after donut, pastry after pastry and the whole huge plate of treats wes finished and in his distended belly. The milk was gone too, of course.

Ms. Fine smiled at the sight of the boy's bigger, more rounded belly. That plate was meant to feed all the teachers in the school and is now sitting in that big, cute tummy.... Ms. Fine woke up a bit late so she didn't have time to bring anything specially for Tommy like she usually did. Usually just some snacks that she would hand him throughout the day, but when she got in to the teacher's lounge, she saw that big, amazing plate of fatty goodness and couldn't resist...


Tommy let out a burp and excused himself and he clearly felt very, very full. But he also seemed happy. "Thank you, so much Ms. Fine, that was amazing!! My parents never give me enough for breakfast so that really hit the spot!!" He said as he rubbed his fuller belly..

"Oh no! You don't get enough breakfast??" Ms. Fine said as if she was appalled... "Just come a bit earlier tomorrow and I'll make sure to have even more goodies for you"

":Oh yes please!!" Tommy said happily.

Ms. Fine looked at the clock, there was still 5 more minutes before the rest of the class was scheduled to come in. She excused herself and told Tommy to stay in his seat until she came back and she went to the staff vending machine to "stock up" for the day. Chips, cookies, sodas, candy bars.. lots of candy bars. All of it for Tommy's big and quickly growing belly.
111233111.title: Tommy saw a HUGE plate of dessert on his desk

1112331111.content:
Since Ms. Fine's huge bag was filled to the brim with fattening goodies for her expanding little adorable student she felt ready to start the day.
She would teach the class, because that was her job, and she was good at her job... but Tommy's growing fat ball of a belly was going to get her full attention today.

Especially after his comment about not getting enough food at home... Poor sweet adorable little chubby boy that just needs to eat and eat and grow bigger and bigger and SO. MUCH. FATTER

Ms. Fine passed out some reading worksheets for the class and when she got to Tommy's desk, she also plopped down 2 big, king size Hershey bars

"For some extra brain power" She smiled and winked at her little fatty student.

Tommy blushed at this extra attention from his gorgeous teacher Wowee Ms. Fine really likes me.. no one else got chocolate!
He instinctively knew to keep his chocolate quiet and he silently munched as he worked on his paper.
He was still a bit stuffed from his gorging session earlier, but he always had room for creamy, delicious chocolate.

He was finishing the second big chocolate bar, his mouth very sticky with chocolate, and was also almost done with the back of the worksheet when Ms. Fine called out in her professional teacher voice, "Tommy, would you come here, please?"

Tommy got up nervously and Ms. Fine winked at him and held up a bottle of cola.
He chugged it down very quickly and as his belly started expanding with the sweet, bubbly liquid his uniform T-shirt began to untuck as his belly grew larger and rounder... right before Ms. Fine's eyes....

"Tommy, I'm emailing your mother right now to tell her that I need you to stay after school today for some extra tutoring. Don't worry, you're not behind or anything, but I really want to test and push your limits, Ok, sweetie?" Ms Fine's eyes twinkled

"Uh.. sure. Ms. Fine, whatever you think is best," he blushed.

"Ok then it's settled. I'll order a few pizzas and some ice cream and we'll make a party out of it. Please go back and finish up at your desk.. Oh and take this with you." She said handing him 2 Twinkies and another bottle of soda.

1113211.content:
Susan looked over at Damien, who at this point had settled into the couch and was watching TV. She tried to picture him at twice his weight and more, imagining a protruding round belly over his currently skinny frame. What would he look like with a belly that stuck out noticeably? Or if it protruded out into his lap? Or even out past his knees?

The more she thought about it, the more she chastised herself for not thinking about it earlier. He would look so adorable if he were morbidly obese like her. It was settled.

“Hey Damie?” She asked.

“What?” He said, not looking away from the TV.

“What do you want to do when you grow up?” She said to him. Idly, she thought, she’d have to add more beef to her mix now.

“What?” He turned to face her, a single eyebrow raised. “I dunno. Don’t you only think about that after you graduate?”

Susan shook her head. “It’s good to come up with an idea for what you want to do so you can prepare for it in advance.” She added more seasoning to the beef before pulling it out of the bowl, smushing it into lumps.

“Well I don’t know what I want to do.”

“You can do what Mommy does. You remember what my job, right?” A ding was heard, and she put on a pair of oven mitts to get the mac and cheese—Damien’s favorite—out of the oven. She pulled out the double size dish and set it down to cool.

“But I’m not fat like you, Mom.” He said. It was the truth, and in their household where it was just the two of them, Susan had emphasized to Damien that “fat” wasn’t a bad word. It simply meant you were big and beautiful, or perhaps in Damien’s case, he’d be handsome.

“Well that can be fixed Damie. You just have to start eating more.” She said. “Want to give it a try?”

“Umm... Well...” Damien put his hand to his chin in thought.

11132113.content:
"Umm... Well..." Damien put his hand to his chin in thought. "It's uh... funny that you mention all this."

"Why's that?" Susan asked. She formed the beef lumps into much more nicely shaped hamburger patties and set them on the grill to cook. The hamburger patties she always used were fatty and very calorie dense. She made sure to drop a nice helping of butter on them to really juice them up. There were five of them on the stove--four for her and one for Damien. Thinking quickly, she grabbed another thing of beef from the fridge.

"I kinda wanted to do that anyway..." He said, looking to the side. "Well maybe not really the modeling stuff, I dunno. But I did want to get fat. Looks like you have a lot of fun with it so I wanted to try it out." He laughed, looking at her with a silly grin on his face.

"Well that's just perfect, Damie." She said. "And the best part about it is that we can get started now. Give me just a bit and I'll be done with dinner."

That worked out well--better than she expected actually. Maybe she wouldn't have to save as much of the Mac and Cheese this time--he'd probably eat more of it if she asked him to. She made another two hamburger patties for him and put them on the stove, humming along as she finished the dinner.

In the end, she wound up making quite a lot of food. Three hamburgers and a very generous helping of Mac and Cheese waited for Damien, along with a big cup of soda. She also wound up making a whole bunch of tater tots for the two of them to share. Overall, it was probably more food than he'd eat in a day, much less a sitting, but Susan was looking forward to testing where her son's limits were.

Susan used to be rather svelte herself before she took on the modeling job, discovering that her appetite was in fact ridiculous. There was a chance that Damien would be the same.

"Damie! Dinner's ready!" She called. He hopped off the couch and into the kitchen, his eyes going wide at the sheer amount of food on his plate. He'd never eaten this much in one sitting before, but his mom looked confident enough, taking her own seat on the other side of the table in her reinforced chair. Her meal was still bigger than his, but not by as much any more. Where she would normally eat anywhere from four to eight times as much as he did in a meal, this time her portion was less than double the size of his, all though it was in no way reduced.

"That's a lot of food." Damien said, sitting down. He didn't even know where to start.

"If you eat it all we can go out for milkshakes." Susan said, digging into one of her hamburgers.

Damien started eating with the hamburgers as well, savoring the extra juicy meat and the generous amount of toppings. He didn't know if he could eat all this, but at the same time, the food was delicious. "You're on!" He said, as he started to eat as fast as he could.

Susan was impressed and proud watching her son wolf down the food she put in front of him. Normally he ate more conservatively, but clearly there was a side to him that he'd been suppressing until now. The first two hamburgers went down without a fuss whatsoever. He slowed down a bit on the third, but he still was able to finish it eventually. After that, he moved onto the Mac and Cheese and--as expected--inhaled it. And finally, he and Susan both helped themselves to the tater tots, drenched in sauce, and soon they were gone. Overall, dinner was actually very quick. When it was over, Damien leaned back in his chair, sighing. His belly was visible through his tight shirt, the distended ball being a far cry from his normally flat-bellied frame. Susan couldn't stop herself from smiling.

"Good job Damie!" She said. Standing up slowly, she made her way around the table. "How's it feel?"

"I'm so full." Damien admitted, rubbing his belly.

"Well you're just getting started, kiddo. Guess who just earned himself a milkshake?"

He'd forgotten about that, Susan noticed, as his face lit up once again. He must have found some extra room in his stomach, because his happy shout definitely didn't sound like someone who was really full. As she thought.

"Well then, let's get some milkshakes." She said. The two of them made their way into the garage and got into the car. Damien was always acutely aware of just how his mother fit into her seat. She spilled over the sides, and her belly was dangerously close to rubbing up against the steering wheel. Her left side was so big that she had to smash it into the door, and her right side spilled almost entirely over the center console. Damien wondered if he'd ever get that big. Then he decided he'd get even bigger than that.

They pulled up to the milkshake place and went into the drive-thru. Damien did his best to see over his mother as they looked at what was available. In the end, she would up ordering an extra-large chocolate milkshake for herself and Damien got an extra-large peanut-butter milkshake.

"Good choice, Damie." She said as they received their milkshakes. Damien wasted no time in digging into his as they made their way back. "Peanut butter's got a lot of calories in it. It'll all go to your belly." The boy was too busy enjoying his milkshake to notice that his shirt was starting to come up, revealing the bottom of his belly.

Oh yeah, she thought. If he kept eating like this, he'd start packing on the pounds in no time. It would only be a matter of time before someone would notice.

Susan was preparing another large dinner for Damien when he and Erik walked in the door. "I'm home!" He called out. "I brought Erik!"

"Hiya Erik!" She called from the kitchen.

"Hey Miss Ellison." Erik said, taking his shoes off at the doorway. "Thanks for having me."

There'd be more than enough for him anyway. But just in case, she figured she'd get started on another side.

She wondered if Erik knew. He was Damien's best friend and they hung out together all the time so it was bound to happen eventually. She shrugged and continued preparing dinner.

Erik and Damien came back down the stairs and made a beeline to the pantry. The two grabbed a handful of snacks, including a bag of chips and a package of cookies and some sodas before heading back upstairs.

====

Damien sat down on the edge of his bed in front of the TV set up on his dresser. Erik chose to sit next to him.

"So what's the deal with you getting fat?" Erik said.

"Well, you've seen my mom. It's kinda something I wanted to do for a while." Damien admitted. "My mom asked if I wanted to do what she does one day. You know--plus-size modeling."

Erik nodded. Damien had explained to him that concept before and he sort of understood it. Apparently Susan made a lot of money off of it so he wasn't about to question her choice. "So you're trying to stuff as much food as you can into your mouth, basically?"

"Basically." Damien agreed, opening the cookies. Shoving some into his mouth, he spoke around them. "Wanna play some Xbox?"

Erik smiled. "Sure."

====

Soon, dinner was ready, and Susan hollered up the stairs to let them know. They came racing down, Erik just a bit faster than Damien, and quickly sat at the table. Susan had prepared big meals of chicken-fried steak for them, although Erik's was dwarfed by the other two.

"Just let me know if you get hungry and I'll dish you up some more, honey." Susan said, sitting on her chair as it creaked under her weight.

"I'm alright. Thanks though." Erik said. By the time he picked up his utensils, Damien was already wolfing down his food. It was at this moment that Erik understood just how hard Damien was going at this whole gaining thing. He'd eaten half of the chips and all of the cookies, and chugged both his and Erik's sodas, and now he was eating all of this food as though that didn't even happen. Even Susan was taking her time with the food, although there was still a lot more on her plate. The blond boy couldn't help but watch, entranced, as Damien plowed through his food with complete abandon.

Two chicken-fried steaks, mashed potatos, beans, and a heaping helping of buttery corn later saw Damien leaning back in his chair, patting back his dome-like belly with a burp. "That was good, Mom."

Erik nodded, finishing the last bite of his comparatively modest meal. Even so, he was basically full. "Yeah. Thanks Miss Ellison."

She waved it off. "No worries. Are you sure you're full, Damie? I could order a pizza."

Damien was about to speak, but Erik cut him off. "Get two. I'm a little peckish still. Please." He added at the end. Susan had no problems with this, and she nodded before going to the phone.

Damien looked at Erik quizzically. "You're still hungry?"

Erik shook his head. "No, but..."

11132113122131.content:
The pizza had soon arrived, and Erik rushed it up to Damien’s room excitedly. The scent of meat and grease filled the air, and when Erik opened one of the boxes, he could see that this pizza was even thicker, longer, and greasier than normal. Each slice was probably over 600 calories, he thought. And he’d make Damien eat them all.

The boys just played some MK11 at first, with Damien passively eating the pizza and ice cream as he went. Erik thought that eventually Damien would lose some steam and he’d have to help out, but the boy just kept on eating. After he finished the whole first box in record time he tossed it to the side and grabbed the next, tearing out the first massive slice of pizza from that one as if he hadn’t eaten all day.

“Damn dude.” Erik whistled. “No wonder you gained 25 pounds in a week.”

Damien giggled. “Yeah. I really like pigging out. Being full and eating even more is the best part.” He continued.

“Have you ever been really full in your life?” Erik wondered.

“I’ve never been full enough to stop eating. Same thing with my mom. That’s why she’s so fat.” Damien tote through another slice of pizza, savoring the hot greasy flavors for just a second before finishing it off. “Can you run down and get more stuff to eat? I think I’m gonna run out.”

“Seriously?” Erik said with a grin. He complied and went downstairs, grabbing several boxes of whatever junk food he could find down there, along with a six pack of soda. He got a look at Susan too, who herself was still eating. She burped and looked over to Erik. “You two doing okay?”

“Just fine. He’s going nuts up there, so I gotta get more food.” Erik said, holding up all of the snacks he carried in between his arms. Susan seemed absolutely delighted delighted by this given her laugh, and Erik watched as all the folds of her body jiggled and swayed as she did so.

“Do you need me to order more? I can do that?”

“Umm... probably yeah.” Erik said. “Just in case.”

She nodded. Standing up from the couch, Erik watched transfixed as she moved over to where the phone was. She didn’t seem in any way out of breath from this action as he’d expect someone her size to be, and his eyes lingered on her for a bit longer than he cared to admit as she walked past. Her butt swayed and jumped as she went, and her pendulous belly swayed side to side as she walked. Her booming steps took her to the kitchen where she placed an order for another meal of take out Italian, and Erik grinned. “Just you wait Damien, I’ll be the first one to make you full.”

He ran back upstairs to see that Damien had polished off the pizza box and the ice cream. “What took you so long?” He asked.

“I got your mom to order some food. I’m gonna find your limit bro, whatever it takes.”

“You’re on!” The two boys laughed, and Damien got to work on all of the junk food that Erik brought up.

“Hang on.” Damien said, two boxes of snacks later. He quickly reached under his belly and unbuttoned his jeans. As he did so, his belly jumped outward another inch or so, slowly wobbling afterward.

“Holy shit.” Erik said. He took hold of Damien’s belly some more, playing around with it. “That’s so cool.”

Damien cracked open another snack box and with renewed vigor got to work on the slices in there. In between each, Erik rubbed his belly and played with it. Damien burped a few times. In the end, Damien had managed to eat all the pizza and ice cream, all the snacks Erik brought up, six sodas, and an Italian meal for two.

“Ok, last one.” Erik said, tearing open the last pack of Zebra cakes and stuffing them both into Damien’s mouth. The boy chewed for a second before swallowing both. He leaned back against the headboard of his bed, a long, drawn out burp erupting from his mouth.

“Alright, I’m stuffed.” Damien said, patting his taut belly.

“You did a good job. That was like a million times more than I could ever eat.”

Damien merely sighed in response to that. Without warning, Erik reached under Damien’s shirt and pulled it off over his head.

“What’re you doing?” Damien asked tiredly.

“I...”
11132113122131.title: Damien can eat a lot!

choices: A week later, Damien’s continuing to grow rapidly
A month later, Damien’s appetite starts to surpass Susan’s.
111321131221312.content:
The food had run out, and the two boys still had time to hang out before they slept. Erik took his shirt off as well, saying to Damien that he wanted to compare.

“Why?” Damien asked.

“Well I just think it’ll be cool you know?” Erik said.

The two were as different as night and day. Erik was slim, even for a boy his age, with signs of impending muscle coming through in his barely visible abdominals and pectorals. Damien, on the other hand, was already getting to be much bigger than Erik, and his currently overstuffed belly didn’t help. There was a soft layer of fat on top of his bloated belly, and his chest was starting to bulge out into what would later become moobs.

“Your pants are too small.” Erik observed. “Hah! You’re going to have a big butt like your Mom.” He squished in a piece of side fat that was already starting to roll over the top of Damien’s pants.

Damien giggles, unexpectedly ticklish, and Eric continued tickling with a savage grin on his face as Damien howled with laughter. “Stop! Stop! Uuuuuuurp” He burped loudly out of nowhere, and both boys were gasping with laughter.

They continued messing around for a while until they both got tired, and eventually the call of the void called both boys into sleep. Tired from the day’s events they both slept as they were, which amused Susan to no end when she came upstairs to check on them.

She giggled when she saw Erik’s head resting on Damien’s belly as though it was a pillow. Both boys were snoring deeply, so there would be no harm in turning the light off and closing the door.
111321131221312.title: Post feast chill time

1113211312213121.content:
Over the course of the next week, Damien settled into an enhanced standard of eating thanks to Erik's help. Between hem and Susan, there was hardly a moment when Damien wasn't eating aside from class, and it was really beginning to show. His eating schedule had become eating an enormous breakfast of very heavy and delicious food, followed by heading to school with an array of snacks in his back. Lunch was always a big meal for him too, because Susan made sure he had a nice double decker sandwich stuffed with meat and other goodies like mayonnaise and cheese. He also had a handful of other kinds of snacks in his lunch prepared for him.

Finally, Erik had somehow made it a game for others to give him their food and see how much he could eat. Damien was surprised when all of his friends started offering him food. He greedily gulped it down time and again to the amazement of his friends, no matter what they gave him. It got to the point where some of them were asking their parents to pack them more food so they could watch Damien eat it all, which the boy didn't mind one bit.

Damien woke up with a yawn, rolling on his side before pushing himself up to a sitting position. He was shirtless this time, because his shirt had gotten a bit too tight on him. Stretching up to yawn, it was plainly clear that his belly had gotten quite a bit bigger than it was just a week before. Stretch marks covered it all the way around, and those marks continued down below the waistline of his strained pajama pants. His lower half had also gotten quite a bit bigger--his butt had a new wobble to it with every step and when he sat down he got noticeably wider. He stood up and went to the bathroom to get ready.

His mom had gotten him a scale of his own to use. It looked just like hers and Damien looked forward to using it to its maximum potential. It had been about a week since he'd weighed himself, so he stood on the scale and got ready to remember what he saw.
1113211312213121.title: Riding the Gain Train

choices: Take a picture/video of my new fat self
11132113122131213.content:
Damien’s weight gain has been improving so much, he’d just gained more than he did the week before. When he saw how much he weighed, he felt astonished and couldn’t believe he’s now at 150 pounds! That’s a 35 pound gain and much improved, which his constant eating with getting himself full a lot, was to be the main factor behind his successful gain.

“Wow! I think my weight gain’s getting better even more! I bet I could reach 200 by the end of the week!” Damien was obsessed with that, as he smiled by staring himself at the mirror.

He would give his belly a jiggle by his hands, as it felt like a jelly than it was, when Damien was skinny to begin with. As well as that, he also had the different look, especially he’s getting two chins, with his face looking rounder. Even his arms are getting thick as well, and starts pinching just to feel how flappy it feels.

He then focuses down at the bottom, and the main feature was his hips had gotten wide, which he turned around to see his butt and meaty thighs have gotten rounder and a bit bigger. He would give his butt a slap, which it vibrated the way his fat’s developing. Of course, Damien laughed at himself, blushing since he’s still trying to get used to being fat in a short space of time.

Once he was done checking it out, Damien would store the scales back underneath the sink, and headed back to his bedroom. From there, he had thought of an idea and suggested with that smirk expression in him.

“Hmm... I wonder if I could ___________, and show this to my Mom?” Damien wondered.
11132113122131213.title: That’s A Big Improvement!

choices: Erik starts feeding Damien on the bus.
Erik invites Damien to go to his family’s pool with all their friends.
Nothing special happens this week, except Damien gains weight even faster!
111321131221312131.content:
Damien went back to his room and dug in his dresser for smaller clothes. He found a pair of pajama pants that fit him just two weeks ago. Well, he tried at least. As he tried to stuff his leg through it he discovered that he could no longer get the seat of those pants up above his butt. He tried his best, but when he managed to get them over they tore apart. He shrugged. Having gone from a 22 to a 36 in that time it made sense. Damien discarded the destroyed pants and looked for another piece of clothing.

He found a tank top that fit him just two weeks ago and put it on over his shoulders. Dragging it down over his body, he was stunned to find that his arms filled up the holes that used to be much larger around them before. And also, he couldn’t drag it down over his belly. No matter how hard he tried, he brought it down over his soft jelly-like belly only for it to bounce back up to the top of it. And that shirt had been rather loose on him two weeks ago. Damien grinned. “I’m so fat now. This is freaking awesome!”

He finished getting dressed and went downstairs for breakfast. As usual, the normal string smell of a grotesquely unhealthy southern breakfast filled his nostrils, and Damien was salivating. His belly wobbled and jiggled around as he went down the stair, his tank top sitting on top doing nothing to cover his stretch mark-ridden lower belly whatsoever.

“Good morning Damie!” Susan greeted him as he came down the stairs. She gained weight as well over the last week bringing her to a little under 580 pounds, and it showed as she was beginning to overflow out of her clothes too. “You’re becoming very handsome young man. Did you weigh in today?”

“Yep! I’m over 150 now!” He grinned, giving his hefty belly a wobble as he said it.

“Good job Damie! Well, let’s eat. I made you even more food today so you should be nice and full before you get to school.”

“Okay!” Damien said cheerfully. He started wolfing down all of the eggs, sausages, and fried chicken she put down in front of him. This breakfast had it all, from biscuits running with fatty gravy to several pieces of chicken fried steak and everything in between. Overall it wouldn’t be far off to assume that Damien had consumed more than 8000 calories this meal. His drink of choice was chocolate and peanut butter-mixed heavy cream, and he gulped the heavy drink down with no problems whatsoever, adding another 2000 calories on top of that.

“Whew!” Damien said, patting his belly. Thanks Mom.

“Anything for you sweetheart!” She cooed, standing up from the table. “Now brush your teeth and be ready for school, okay?”

“Okay Mom!”
111321131221312131.title: A tight fit

1113211312213121312.content:
It was later in the afternoon, when Damien had been invited to come to Erik for a swimming pool party with all of their friends. He was delighted to come along, especially when all of them knew and helped him getting fatter along the way. It would’ve been s different story, that wouldn’t be possible with a help, otherwise he would have to feel embarrassed of showing off his growing fat belly to begin with.

But they all adored Damien’s fat body, as much as they helped, along with Erik in charge of his group. Once Damien told everybody his milestone weight he gained, it it was important to celebrate with it, and so that’s why Erik is hosting the swimming party at his house to begin with, just so he could give something back of the accomplishments that all had achieved so far.

Damien is certainly looking forward to this, and so after school, once he had dinner with his mother, he wasted no time but to head over to Erik’s house straight away. He came in with his swimsuit on, with goggles and towel he’s brought with him. He was actually shirtless, which let’s himself showing off his fat belly jiggling in each step he makes. His moobs that was started to show, is getting a bit of the jiggles too, and his arms and are so thick too!

He is so ready for this, and once he reached the front door, he rings the bell, and waited for the door to be opened. Luckily, it was Erik that answered the door for him, and he was certainly glad to see his best friend coming over, but it didn’t take long until he started to blush upon Damien’s appearance, which he really couldn’t help himself.

“Hey Damie! Glad you could mak... Wow! You looked so good, buddy!” Erik blushed in surprise, when he see’s his best friend’s belly being shown at the front door.

“Oh yeah! Good thing I’m not afraid to show it to everybody, since they all helped be to get to this point anyway.” Damien laughed at Erik’s priceless reaction, and gives his belly at pat to make it jiggling again.

“I bet everybody would love to see you with that! Come on in, and I’ll take you to the pool to see them.” Erik says and moves himself out of the way, so he’ll let Damien in the house.

The fat kid smiled with a nod, and followed Erik across the room, where he can smell some great food, both from the kitchen, and then outside with Erik’s mother helping out with some barbecue for all of them for a fun time. It smells so good, he couldn’t wait to stuff himself, so the more he gets bigger, the more opportunity he’ll get to reach his mother’s weight in no time.

All the food was in his mind, that is until he heard Erik letting the boys know, once they arrived at the backyard.

“Hey guys! Look who’s here to join the fun?” Erik yelled, letting the boys know by showing Damien making his entrance.

They all stare at Damien, and very delighted to see Damien came over, but also a chance to see him in shirtless, now that his fat belly is fully shown. Damien laughed at their response when making a amazed expression, so he would make a reply by waving towards them.

“Hi guys! I’m glad to let you show off my fat body, since you all helped.” Damien smiled, and pats his fat belly to make it jiggle, much to the boys’ amusement to say the least.

“Say, you wanna ___________ to start things off?” Erik wondered with an idea he wants Damien to start the fun.
1113211312213121312.title: Some party to celebrate at Erik’s pool!

11132113122131213122.content:
“Say? You wanna eat lots of food to start things off?” Erik asked, eying Damien’s belly. “Dinner’s basically ready.”

“You read my mind!” Damien laughed. He slapped his belly, running his hand up and down it. “I’m starving! I haven’t eaten since forty minutes ago!” He said. Erik matched his grin said “Well you better be ready then because we’re serving your food!”

He led Damien to one of the poolside chairs and sat him down, gesturing with his hand to get all of their friends to come over. “Alright boys we’re gonna make sure Damie here’s ready to pop. Let’s get going!”

The barbecue officially began when all of the kids ran off to where all of the food was settled. Erik came back first with a whole tray of hamburgers, lathered with delicious barbecue sauce, bacon, cheese and mayonnaise, and one other sauce that Damien didn’t recognize. The beef patties in each were huge and must have been well over a pound, but that didn’t stop Damien from salivating at the sight.

“What’s that sauce?” Damien asked.

“Oh just the secret ingredient to my Ultrafatty burgers. I made these myself out of the absolute junkiest fat food I could find.” He beamed with pride at his invention, and when Damien started plowing down on his first, he realized what kind of gold his friend had struck. He started eating with abandon, shoving as much as he could down his throat at once. Erik sat back and watched with a blush as his friend’s belly slowly rose as more and more food entered it. The others came back with their assembled platters, letting Damien also choose from various drinks, entrees, and all kinds of junk food.

“These are all deep fried.” One of the other boys, Dylan, said as he set down a plate piled high with powdered batter rolls that contained Oreos, Twinkies, and other calorie bombs. “If these don’t make get you huge don’t know what will.”

The boys dished themselves up their own meals at this point. Erik sat by Damien as he ate, no longer surprised that he was slowly diminishing the food set out around him before he even made decent progress with his own food. Seeing Damien eat like this made Erik wonder if he’d actually finish all of what was set in front of him. And surely enough, his plates were slowly stacking.

The boys had to get up and retrieve even more food for him at this point because he clearly wasn’t stopping, and they piled up a bunch more food in front of his. Damien kept eating though, and all of that food soon disappeared. Finally, it had been long enough that each of the boys had finished their own meals that Erik cleared his throat. He put his hand on Damien’s taut belly that stuck out much further than it did when he arrived.

“Alright guys, we did a good job. I think we should _________”
11132113122131213122.title: Poolside Feast!

“Yeah!” All the boys respond in unison, and wasted no time but to head to the pool and jumped in to make a splash.

1113211312213121312211.content:
The boys played in the pool for a little while and had a lot of fun swimming around, splashing each other, and playing pool games. Eventually, their attention ran out, and they all decided to get out of the pool and towel off.

"That was a lot of fun!" Luke said. "This was a great idea!"

"Hopefully we can do this again sometime." Alex agreed.

Damien toweled himself off as well, running his towel across the new fat he'd gained. His body jiggled and wobbled with each stroke, and as he dried off his back his whole belly swung side to side. Erik grabbed a handful of Damien's belly and jiggled it. "Well it's because of this guy we got together. All you gotta do is get fatter." He said.

"You'd better be ready to invite us over a ton then." Damien grinned. "Cuz I plan on getting super fat."

"I wouldn't have it any other way bud!" Dylan clapped Damien's shoulder and grinned. "You better eat some more tonight so we hit that goal!"

Damien nodded, "I think I might be getting hungry again after being in the pool. Let's see if there's anything we can scavenge!"

The boys wandered into the kitchen where the remainder of the food was being stored. There was still plenty of dessert to eat so each of the boys served themselves a nice plate of cookies, brownies, and other sweet treats. Damien couldn't help but pick up a couple of brownies and stuff them into his mouth right away, to the endless amusement of Erik. "You're definitely still hungry Damie!"

"Kinda yeah. I get hungry real fast." He admitted, stuffing a few more into his mouth.

"Well let's stockpile a bunch and bring it all downstairs. How about we play some games?" Erik said. "I'll kick all of your butts at Mortal Kombat!"

"Them's fightin' words!" Kayden said with a grin, ready for a challenge. And stockpile they did, grabbing as many desserts and sodas as they could carry with them downstairs. They all filed down the stairs and into the basement, where there was a large entertainment center set up with a massive TV. There were a bunch of gaming consoles and games on the left side, and Erik walked up to it.

"Alright Kayden, time to see the master at work." He said, handing the controller to him. "Loser's out."

"Dibs on next game!" Dylan called.

The boys all set their order to play and turned on the Xbox. In the meantime, the others who weren't playing watched intently, eating their desserts. Damien leaned back against the couch, casually using his shirtless belly as a table to hold his plate that was stacked high with food.

"Yeah there's still room in there." Dylan poked Damien's belly, squishing it in a little. He picked up a brownie and stuffed it into Damien's mouth. "Let me help you out a bit." He said. Damien didn't mind one bit, and he grunted his approval while chewing the brownie. As he swallowed, they heard Erik's triumphant whoop and Kayden's exasperated sigh and Dylan shrugged. "Guess I'm next!"

The boys continued playing and eating, switching off of Mortal Kombat and switching to other games. At some point they turned the Xbox off and decided to just talk.

Erik grunted and said...

Before he did

111321131221312131221112312.content:
Erik woke up. The light filtered in through the basement window and hit his eyes in the most awful way. He grunted. Where was he?

Glenn grinned. “Sure son! Go ahead and order everything on the menu.” He fished out his wallet from his back pocket, taking out a credit card. Seth grinned in return and grabbed hold of the card, marching up to the counter.

The clerk at the counter looked at him from the other side of the register. “What can I get started for you, bud?”

Seth hadn’t seen this guy before—he must have been new. Too skinny to have worked here long. His Fat House uniform looked a little big and baggy on him, so obviously the manager intended to keep him for a while.

The black-haired boy looked at the menu, not deciding what he wanted to eat, but what he wanted to eat first. After a little thought he decided, so he said to the clerk, “I want one of everything.”

“Kid,” The clerk said, leaning onto the counter. “I’m trying to work here so don’t mess around.”

Seth rolled his eyes. “I ain’t messing around. One of everything. And extra large size for all of it, obviously.”

The clerk looked at him for a few more seconds before shrugging. “Don’t blame me if your parents flip out.” He muttered. On the screen the clerk pressed every single food item there was, going from top to bottom. “Drinks?”

“Two extra large soda cups and two extra large Fatboy shakes.” Seth said, holding the card up. “We’re over at that table over there.” He pointed to the large circular booth in the back corner.

The clerk swiped the card and handed it back to Seth. “Okay kid, here you go.”

Seth grinned. “Thanks dude!” He walked back to the table. He tried to imagine that guy’s face when he went to the back and his coworkers told him all about how Seth and Glenn came in and ordered the whole menu multiple times a week! He was sure it would be priceless.

Seth sat back down at the table, handing the card back to his dad. “Food’s on the way. They got a new moron working here.”

Glenn laughed. “You better not have given him too much trouble.”

Seth shrugged. “No sir. I gave him just the right amount of trouble. They’ll probably make him push the cart.” He snickered. Seth was referring to the cart that they wheeled all their food out on. "You've got a way to go, Besides when was the last time you saw a runner with a pot belly? You work off any indulgence automatically with your training schedule."
Kelly fondled Eric's imaginary pot belly and soon enough the two were in bed making love.
Drifting off to sleep, Eric mused about what it might feel like to be the bruiser like Jim or even out of shape and indulgent like Rob. Kelly was musing as well. She loved Eric but maybe life would be more fun if he had other interests than running. This weekend he had taken seconds once or twice and even ate desert. Maybe it was time to stop indulging Eric's demands for healthy cooking.
111332.title: Eric

choices: Eric gets used to once a week gourmet feasts
Kelly takes cooking classes and Eric becomes the taster
Eric discovers he has a sweet tooth
1113321.content:
Eric finished his after work run and joined the family at the dinner table. Something smelled good. Kelly wasn't a bad cook but she usually stayed simple and quick- broiled meats, salads, fresh veggies and no desert. He sat down to a savory pot of rich smelling beef in a sauce.
"What's your mother been up to?" he asked the boys. They just grinned. Mom had been in the kitchen since they got home from school leaving them to whatever they wanted. It was fine with them.
"I decided to get serious about cooking." she announced. "Beef Bourgenon. Bon Appetit."
"Smells good, honey but who's going to help us eat all that?"
There on the table was a large pot of steaming stew, hot rolls, salad and green beans. More food than they usually saw in a whole week.

"I know." Kelly said. "But if seemed a shame to go to all that trouble for just a single dinner. The recipe says it freezes well so I can have something good for dinner later with no trouble."
The boys weren't impressed but they ate their share and Eric surprised himself by having a second helping.
"Pretty good, honey." he said, wiping the plate with his third dinner roll. "It's like a fancy restaurant - or your mother's"
It did taste good to Eric and maybe just for the novelty he ate hearty. Later after the boys were in bed and Eric was listening to music, Kelly surprised him with an apple pastry and a scoop of ice cream.
"Whoa." he told her. "I never eat desert."
"They told me that this was the right finish for the dinner and I figured, Eric never eats desert so just one time won't hurt."
She smiled and Eric just couldn't resist.
Later as he got ready for bed, Kelly couldn't keep her hands off his full tummy and Eric found himself even more enthusiastic in their lovemaking.
As they drifted to sleep, Kelly told Eric not to expect a gourmet meal every night,
1113321.title: Kelly takes up gourmet cooking

11133211.content:
Eric began to look forward to Friday nights. But it wasn't just the start of the weekend, Friday meant one of Kelly's pull out the stops special dinners. He never knew what to expect. It was something different each time. But it always meant a big spread and Eric getting stuffed to the gills with delicious food. It would start with Eric changing into something more comfortable like elastic waist pants and an oversized shirt. Then Kelly would bring him a stiff refreshing drink with some munchies to get him warmed up for the main event. Then came course after course of delicious, rich dinner fare washed down with pint after pint of rich, heavy beer. At first, Eric had been reluctant to show his gluttonous hunger but Kelly was soon able to get him to relax and indulge. Eric often didn't remember much about these sessions but was pleased to hear Kelly praise his manful appetite. She didn't mention the noisy belches and farts that accompanied these evenings. Eric generally snored through the night like a hog in slop.
He awoke Saturday morning refreshed and eager for a healthy breakfast and he seemed to have forgotten his long ritual of Saturday morning runs, settling in for a morning nap before taking Kelly out to lunch.
11133211.title: Eric gets used to once a week gourmet feasts

choices: Eating big at the weekend, Eric's appetite grows. He wants more on Mondays too!
Eric develops a permanent potbelly. Kelly ups her game.
111332111.content:
"So what's the verdict?" Kelly asked.

She smiled as Eric nodded and started to chew faster, his mouth currently too full to repond.

"Mm. It's not bad," he said eventually, dabbing his lips with a napkin. "The meatballs are amazing, really soft and delicious but it could do with a lot more cheese."

Kelly nodded as she wrote this down in her notebook. "More cheese... got it. Hmm... perhaps I could make cheesy garlic bread as a side. Would that work?"

A grunt was the only response she got from Eric, whose mouth once again full of meatball calzone. Kelly smiled. He sure enjoys eating more than he enjoys running, she thought. For a few moments she sat there, her salad barely touched, watching her husband saw and stuff, saw and stuff.

"Does the wine go?" she asked, promting Eric to take another deep swig of shiraz.

"*Gulp.* Yes," he said thickly, quickly returning to his food. Kelly turned the bottle and took a picture of the label. Then she topped up Eric's glass. She was surprised to find the wine dribble out. Wow, a whole bottle already. Guess he likes drinking too, she thought, catching the waiter's eye and motioning for another bottle.

Eric was so intent on his food that he barely noticed the waiter replace one bottle with another. Calzone is definitely going to be a winner, Kelly mused to herself, nibbling on her lettuce. With the kids at their grandparents, she and Eric had a tradition of going out for lunch on Saturdays. But it was only recently that she'd had the genius idea of going of using their Saturday lunches as a scouting mission for Eric's Friday Feasts. It worked like this. Each Saturday morning, Kelly would rise early, leaving her snoring husband to sleep off the previous evening's gluttony. At around 10am, she'd bring Eric breakfast in bed, usually three slices of toast thick with butter and jam, or some fried bacon and eggs, and a nice creamy latte from their coffee machine. While Kelly did the laundry, Eric would munch on his breakfast and scroll through the local eateries on his iPad. He had to pick somewhere different every week. Once he'd picked somewhere and finished his breakfast, he'd settle in for a little nap, while Kelly would scour the menu of whatever location he'd chosen and pick out his lunch. She always chose something rich and delicious. They'd go, Eric would eat the chosen meal, giving feedback and notes to Kelly. Come Friday, Kelly would prepare her own version of the meal Eric had eaten, with reference to her notes, always trying to imrprove on it - in quality and, of course, quantity.

Kelly smiled as the waiter set down a plate of crispy calamari beside Eric's calzone. Naturally, as his Friday Feasts consisted of multiple courses, the Saturday Scouting Meals had to as well. As Kelly explained to Eric, she need to know what worked with what. What wines to choose, which sides best complemented the main, what the best dessert would be. The result was that Eric was eating a huge meal and drinking to excess on Saturdays as well as Fridays.

Not that he was complaining. In fact, Kelly had been surprised at how eagerly Eric had adopted the idea. Then again, he did love his Friday Feasts. And the knowledge that his Saturday lunches were a taster before the main event seemed to excite him to greater feats of consumption.

"Ahhh." A contented sigh from Eric pulled Kelly out of her thoughts. She smiled at the empty plates, feeling good that the huge mounds of that calzone and calamari were now nestled in her husband's stomach. Eric belched and chuckled. Kelly realised he was swaying a little in his seat. The wine is kicking in she thought with a smirk.

"Waiter," she called. "I think my husband is ready for his tiramasu.'
111332111.title: Lunch with Kelly

1113321112.content:
The Friday and Saturday feedings were definitely having an effect on Eric. His pants began fitting tighter and getting pushed down by a small belly. Kelly thought it was cute. She was careful not to mention it or draw attention. She was enjoying her growing husband.
Never before had Eric had anything more than a temporary bloat after a family dinner with here brother and brother in law making Eric competitive. Now that Eric wasn't running any more and enjoying Kelly's cooking, he was definitely sporting a pot belly.
Eric had noticed but he had assumed that, like before, this was temporary. Finally, it was just too hard to button them and he announced that they needed to go shopping before their Saturday lunch.
"These pants are just too tight. Unless we stop your cooking extravaganzas or buy me bigger pants."
He was silent and Kelly waited.
"I guess it's

11133211121.content:
After a Saturday morning shopping excursion to update Eric's wardrobe, Kelly noticed that Eric was more likely to eat more. What used to be a big meal was now routine. Eric even complained from time t0 time about Kelly trying to starve him. It wasn't long before Kelly could see that Eric was going to need another shopping trip. But she was on top of her game. She had purchased larger sizes of the new clothes and was ready to slip them into the closet. Eric noticed but took the wrong message.
"I was getting worried," he told Kelly one night after a surprisingly gluttonous Friday dinner. "It seemed like I was going to need new pants last week so I cut back a bit and this week they fit fine."
11133211121.title: Bigger pants

choices: Eric grows so fat he needs a sling for his belly
The directors dine: Tony, Clive & their wives come to feast.
111332111211.content:
"More sausage rigatoni dear?"

Cheeks full, Eric nodded. Kelly smirked as she loaded up his bowl for the third time. She stepped back, watching him dig in like a hog at the trough.

It wasn't Friday or even Saturday, but with Eric getting an unexpected promotion at work, Kelly had decided to surprise him with a celebratory feast. Eric, of course, had eagerly agreed, his fatter stomach growling greedily at the prospect of a long, delicious meal.

"Director of Operations," Kelly whistled in awe at her husband's dull new job title as she dispensed a few more slices of buttery garlic bread onto his plate with the serving tongs. "I think that merits another beer."

Eric grunted smugly, tearing a chunk of garlic bread with his teeth as he watched his wife's tight body wiggle off to the kitchen. Kelly had always said she admired his ambition, and now she was showing her appreciation. And rightly so!

Giddy with delight, Kelly whiped another bottle of beer from their well stocked fridge for her newly promoted and decidedly paunchy husband. Then she checked the oven, breathing in the smell of black forest gateau. A dessert fit for a king, she thought. Or at least a junior director in a marketing company.

Kelly smiled to herself. She wasn't sure what excited her more, the fact that Eric's promotion come with a hefty payrise that would fund some luxurious and for Eric very fattening holidays, or the fact that his executive position meant he'd now have even less time to exercise and would spend even more time sitting on his big butt than he had previously.

When she returned to the dining room, Kelly was pleased to see that Eric had polished off his rigatoni and was helping himself to the last slice of garlic bread. She handed him his beer.

"How was the rigatoni, dear?" she asked, unnecessarily, give how fast he'd devoured three mammoth helpings.

Eric grunted. "Good. I'll need dinner early tomorrow," he added self importantly. "Going out after with Clive and Tony for drinks to discuss my new role."

"Of course," Kelly said obediently, her mind filling with images of an already bloated Eric quaffing beer after beer. "Say, we'll have to invite them round for dinner one weekend too, show them what a great cook your wife is!" she added, nudging Eric in his the place where his ribs would have been, if they weren't buried under layers of fat.

Kelly tried not to sound too excited as she spoke. Clive and Tony were the other directors at Eric's company. Eric had pointed them out to her once at a social function, and it wasn't a sight she'd soon forget.

Both in their forties, Eric's fellow directors were two of the biggest men Kelly had ever seen, with great swelling bellies grown enormously fat on wealth and greed, and rail-thin trophy wives some twenty years their junior, making them look even fatter.

Kelly watched her own husband's stomach swell as he glugged his beer, the buttons of his shirt bulging with every gulp. She wondered if he'd get as fat as Clive and Tony. In the eight months since she'd started Eric's Friday feasts and Saturday scouting sessions he'd certainly ballooned, growing a big fat ball gut and chubby arms, and he didn't seem to mind. It was part denial, part subconscious acceptance, she guessed. And part just a love of food.

Kelly grinned. The perfect combination to ensure Eric grew a belly to rival his new buddies.

A belch notified her that Eric had finished his beer. He looked up at her with a fat smile.

"What's for dessert?" he said.

------

What happens next?

Option 1: Obsessed with having the fattest husband, Kelly overfeeds Eric so much he has to wear a sling to carry his belly around

Option 2: The director's dine! Tony, Clive and their wives come round to watch sports and feast. Can Kelly cook enough for three gluttonous appetites? And will Eric be able to keep pace with his porcine rivals.

Hannah...

11221.content:
Jessica was a cute, chubby 4 year old that LOVED to eat and loved the feeling of feeling stuffed and fat. Her mom, Dana, didn't care much either way about her weight, and figured she would outgrow it. Plus she worked a lot and had a very busy life, so her daughter's weight was just not really on her radar. Dana was rather effortlessly thin herself despite being a pretty heavy child so she figured it was normal..

She hired a 16 year old neighbor girl, Susie, to bring and pick Jessica up from daycare and stay with her everyday until Dana got home.

Dana didn't know that Susie had a bit of a quirk about her...
It was a quirk that greedy little Jessica did not mind one bit though....

Susie LOVED fat little girls, and feeding them lots of food and watching them grow fatter and fatter...

She actually had quite the history of doing this and had a good sense of what to look for in a potential feedee and she scoped Jessica out before offering her services to her mom..

Chubby, always hungry, loves sweets, cute and kind.... Jessica was the perfect target to fatten up.


So the story begins with Susie picking up Jessica from daycare...
Jessica runs over to Susie and jumps into her arms. "Susie!!!!" She said lovingly.
"I'm starving!!"

Susie smiled. "I know my cute little butterball... I'll feed you, don't you worry!!"
Jessica smiled knowing that there was a LOT of yummy food coming to her very soon.
She was only under Susie's care for the last week or so but she has already began associating Susie with eating a lot because Susie ALWAYS makes sure Jessica eats as much as she possibly can when she's with her.

Susie noticed that Jessica's top was getting a little small and her belly was peaking out and hanging... Susie was getting excited, She's already getting fatter!! Oh she's gonna be huge in no time!! She thought to herself..

Hmm maybe we should buy some bigger size clothes before Dana notices how fast Jessica's belly is growing....
She thought.

"What kind of food are we going to eat?" Jessica asked innocently as her stomach loudly rumbled. "I'm REALLY hungry Susie, I hardly ate anything at daycare!!" She started to get sad.

"Don't worry sweetie we're going to the mall where we can get you whatever you want and more! Don't worry, your tummy will be very happy! We can also get you some new clothes that fit your cute little tummy better"

Jessica smiled. She knew Susie would take care of her and her tummy was always VERY happy when Susie was around. She always got that really nice full feeling that she didn't get other times. She really liked that full fat feeling... and she could tell her tummy was getting bigger and rounder and she really liked that feeling too. Her little mind started racing with all the yummy food possibilities in the mall.

Burgers, fries, chicken strips, Cinnabon, ice cream, milkshakes, Mrs. Fields, Chinese food...... so many delicious options.... and Susie always got her whatever she wanted and more....

She licked her lips. The drive to the mall felt like FOREVER but they finally arrived. .
Susie asked Jessica what she wants and the little girl looked around.. she really wanted a little bit of everything.. but that would be way too much, right?

Of course Samatha doesn’t seem to be caring about her enormous weight, and just basically enjoying life as it is.

Hi Mommy! I’ve got s challenge for you!” Betty says to make an introduction.

“Oh, for me?” Samatha looked puzzled at that moment, but smiled regardless to make a response. “So what’s the challenge, sweetie?”

“Well, I wanna challenge you to a weight gain contest, and see who gets to eat the most by the end of the month!” Betty makes a surprising response, and makes a grin look on her face as a result.

1353121.content:
This story takes place three months after the cup brothers (Cuphead and Mugman) had freed everyone from the Devil's clutches.
Anyways, at Grim Matchstick's tower, Grim had been pretty sad lately. Ever since he had fought Cuphead and Mugman, he had just been getting a little fatter mainly due to not doing anything other than flying around.
After thinking his life would stay the same for a long, long time, there was a knock at his door.
Grim was ecstatic to have someone wanting to talk to him.
Grim opened the door and it was...
1353121.title: Cuphead (Grim Matchstick)

choices: Eat it all, it can't go to waste, right?
He should eat half of it, leaving the rest for later.
13531211.content:
Grim Matchstick opened the door and it was...

Cuphead!

"Hey Grim, long time no see!" Cuphead says, delighted.
"C-Cuphead? W-What are you d-doing here?" Grim asks.
"Well, I've been thinking about when we fought before...and now that I think about it, you put up with me and mug really well so I thought I'd give you a...reward of sorts!" Cuphead said.
"A r-reward? Well, w-why just m-me?" Grim asks, a little confused.
"Well, really, because no one really talks to you or visits you very often, so I thought why not give you a reward!" Cuphead replied.
Grim's eyes widened.
He had never been given a reward for such a reason.
"R-Really? Y-You'd really do t-that for me?"
Grim said, ecstaticly.
"Of course! Now hold on, let me get it..." Cuphead said, exiting the tower.
Grim was super excited now.

What is it going to be?

Cuphead then came back with about 10 carts, filled with chocolate, crisps, cakes and so much more.
"I thought you might like this!" Cuphead said, letting Grim gaze upon the food.
He was shocked, there was so much!
"C-Cuphead? Are you s-sure about t-this?" Grim asked. "I k-know I like f-food but, this i-is quite a l-lot..."
"Well, you don't need to eat it all at once!" Cuphead said.
"Well, hope you like it, I need to go! Bye!"
Cuphead said, as he ran out the tower.
Grim was now stuck with all this food.
Admittedly, Grim was hungry, but this was a lot!
And this is a reward?
Grim was getting more hungry looking at the food, however.
What should he do?
13531211.title: Cuphead Arrives!

info.brief_description: If fatter is better, let's make this the BEST.
info.description:
Any age, any gender any species....
Whatever the character it doesn't matter but the goal is to make each one of them EXTREMELY FAT.. Try to make the character as fat as possible while still maintaining a good story line.

No 1000+ lb gains all at once.. there can be a large gain at once but must be somewhat believable.. no ray guns or instant wishes etc.. if you're gonna use magic to add to the weight gain it can be like appetite increasing or metabolism slowing but no weight gain without eating.. no force feeding unless tastefully done and not the main focus of the story line.. there are plenty of magic and force-feeding stories. Sex/arousal is ok but also just not as the main focus of the story. No planet size...

As the author of this interactive I reserve the right to edit or remove any chapter that I don't like but I'll give you a heads up before I do.

If I really like a chapter I will give gift points
